block.p: The hot swimsuit for summer is one that mothers will actually enjoy shopping for: the new skull-and-bones boys' swim trunks by J. McLaughlin for Best & Co. In March, the company introduced the line of embroidered swim shorts for boys age 2 to 12 in three patterns: lobsters, sailing knots and skulls. The first four shipments sold out immediately, with the skulls pattern being the clear front-runner. Last week, yet another shipment arrived at the stores -- $55 at Best & Co. in Greenwich, Conn., (203) 629-1743, and through bestandcompany.com.
